meanings.definition: To direct (a film, play, etc.) jointly with another person.
meanings.sent2: The two filmmakers codirected the play successfully.
meanings.sent3: The duo codirected the film, making it twice as fun!
meanings.sent4: Their collaboration codirected the project towards success.
meanings.sent5: She codirected the play with her friend, creating a masterpiece.

meanings.definition: Directed (a film, play, etc.) jointly with another person.
meanings.sent1: He codirected the documentary with his colleague.
meanings.sent2: The team codirected the movie, showcasing their talents.
meanings.sent3: The friends codirected the play, adding double the creativity.
meanings.sent4: Their partnership codirected the film to critical acclaim.
meanings.sent5: She codirected the project with her mentor, learning valuable skills.
